title: Process and Reality, 343–51. Thus Nancy Frankenberry argues that Whitehead’s notion of the consequent nature of God ‘is a suggestive application of certain theological resources ingredient in the use of the emergent paradigm’ in ‘The Emergent Paradigm and Divine Causation’
